encounter_id.description: Unique identifier for a hospital encounter (visit).

patient_nbr.description: Unique identifier for a patient across encounters.

race.description: Patient's race as recorded in the hospital system.

age.description: Age group bracket of the patient (e.g., [70-80)).

weight.description: Patient weight bracket if recorded; often missing.

admission_type_id.description: Numeric code indicating type of admission (e.g., emergency, urgent).

discharge_disposition_id.description: Numeric code indicating discharge status (e.g., home, transfer, deceased).

admission_source_id.description: Numeric code indicating where the patient was admitted from (e.g., referral, ER).

time_in_hospital.description: Length of stay in days for the encounter.

payer_code.description: Code for the primary payment source/insurer.

medical_specialty.description: Primary specialty of the admitting physician/service.

num_lab_procedures.description: Count of lab tests performed during the encounter.

num_procedures.description: Count of procedures (excluding lab tests) performed.

number_outpatient.description: Number of outpatient visits in the year before the encounter.

number_emergency.description: Number of emergency visits in the year before the encounter.

number_inpatient.description: Number of inpatient visits in the year before the encounter.

number_diagnoses.description: Total number of diagnosis codes recorded for the encounter.

max_glu_serum.description: Result for maximum glucose serum test: None, Norm, >200, >300.

A1Cresult.description: Hemoglobin A1c test result: None, Norm, >7, >8.

metformin.description: Medication status for metformin (No, Steady, Up, Down).

repaglinide.description: Medication status for repaglinide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

nateglinide.description: Medication status for nateglinide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

chlorpropamide.description: Medication status for chlorpropamide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

glimepiride.description: Medication status for glimepiride (No, Steady, Up, Down).

acetohexamide.description: Medication status for acetohexamide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

glipizide.description: Medication status for glipizide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

glyburide.description: Medication status for glyburide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

tolbutamide.description: Medication status for tolbutamide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

pioglitazone.description: Medication status for pioglitazone (No, Steady, Up, Down).

rosiglitazone.description: Medication status for rosiglitazone (No, Steady, Up, Down).

acarbose.description: Medication status for acarbose (No, Steady, Up, Down).

miglitol.description: Medication status for miglitol (No, Steady, Up, Down).

troglitazone.description: Medication status for troglitazone (No, Steady, Up, Down).

tolazamide.description: Medication status for tolazamide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

examide.description: Medication status for examide (No, Steady, Up, Down).

citoglipton.description: Medication status for citoglipton (No, Steady, Up, Down).

insulin.description: Medication status for insulin (No, Steady, Up, Down).

glyburide-metformin.description: Medication status for combined glyburide-metformin (No, Steady, Up, Down).

glipizide-metformin.description: Medication status for combined glipizide-metformin (No, Steady, Up, Down).

glimepiride-pioglitazone.description: Medication status for combined glimepiride-pioglitazone (No, Steady, Up, Down).

metformin-rosiglitazone.description: Medication status for combined metformin-rosiglitazone (No, Steady, Up, Down).

metformin-pioglitazone.description: Medication status for combined metformin-pioglitazone (No, Steady, Up, Down).

change.description: Indicates if there was a change in diabetes medication (Ch or No).

diabetesMed.description: Indicates if any diabetes medication was prescribed (Yes/No).
